implementation.functions:
function legacy_reload() luup.log("Sonos: reloading Luup after device creation",2) luup.reload() end
function legacy_start( pdev ) -- Bootstrap to 2.0 from 1.x local found = false local lmin for k,v in pairs( luup.devices ) do if v.device_type == "urn:schemas-toggledbits-com:device:SonosSystem:1" then found = k luup.attr_set( "plugin", 4226, k ) break elseif v.device_type == "urn:schemas-micasaverde-com:device:Sonos:1" and v.device_num_parent == 0 then if not lmin or k < lmin then lmin = k end end end if not found and lmin == pdev then -- Create new Sonos System device, reload. luup.log("Sonos: legacy bootstrap creating new 2.0 master device (reload required)",2) luup.call_action( "urn:micasaverde-com:serviceId:HomeAutomationGateway1", "CreateDevice", { Description="Sonos System", UpnpDevFilename="D_SonosSystem1.xml", UpnpImplFilename="I_SonosSystem1.xml" }, 0 ) luup.call_delay( 'legacy_reload', 30 ) return false, "Upgrading...", "Sonos" end return true, "", "Sonos" end
